column4: I have a problem I have a fresh install of 9.04 and I want to disable pulse audio as it's causing a problem with wine
you may want to try upgrading to the latest wine.   From the winehq site first.
forget aobut that 'add/remove' programs thing. :) its a limited seletion of packages in there.. and 'disabling' is not the same as 'removing'
